about_the_game:
"WELCOME TO DARK FRONT"

"Dark Front is a first-person shooter action and adventure game set in World War II. The game eloquently portrays the grandeur of the war from the East to the West, ranging from ruined cities to the scorching heat of North Africa."

In the dark atmosphere of war, lead your team to victory through close-range combat. Engage in various game modes such as classic Team Deathmatch, Deathmatch, Survive, and more. Dark Front will include different Coop modes. Explore the darkness of the 1940s with your 4-person team in zombie modes, unlocking new levels as you progress. Engage in battles in the post-apocalyptic cities of the future with the 'Post Apocalyptic' mode. Take a different perspective on war with coop modes where you combat artificial intelligence beyond zombie scenarios.

Key Features:

Story Mode:
Join the battle with the single-player story mode. Witness the war spanning from the scorching desert heat to the freezing Eastern Front, from the steppes to the heart of Europe.

Online Modes:
Prepare for conflict with different multiplayer modes and maps in Dark Front.

Coop Modes:
Arm yourself and explore the post-apocalyptic world of the 1940s with various coop modes, including zombie modes. Defend or attack regions against artificial intelligence. Engage in battles in the post-apocalyptic cities of the future with the 'Post Apocalyptic' mode.


Mother Nature:
Discover the new world with Unreal Engine 5 graphics. Battle through the forgotten snowy landscapes of the earth, from ruined cities to swamps and deserts. Neither cold nor heat can deter you.

content_descriptors.notes: General violence in scenes where enemies are neutralized. It includes wounding and killing with a gun.

name: Dark Front

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 6100
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 || AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 12600
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070 || AMD Radeon 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: Dark Front invites you to a great challenge. Now, rise up, put on your armor, grab your weapon, and fight to lead your team to victory.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
